description:
In James Moguls’ final shoot for TTOO he finishes Madeleine’s training in an epic fashion. Madeleine finds that the prior days were just a warm up for her toughest day yet. She is bound and made to balance on first a block of wood, and then to a steel pole, all while James and Mr. Hudson distracts her with punishment.

She proves that after a grueling 4 day training process that she has what it takes to one day become a slave worthy of being owned.
title: Madeleine Day 4
